paramInformation.label: Status upon receipt of 1 click
paramInformation.description: Defines the status of the output O1/O2 after 1 Click

paramInformation.label: Status upon receipt of 2 clicks
paramInformation.description: Defines the status of the output O1/O2 after 2 Clicks

paramInformation.label: Type of outputs
paramInformation.description: Defines how the outputs are controlled

paramInformation.label: Number of clicks that control the device
paramInformation.description: Defines the Clicks on the Switches that control associated devices

paramInformation.label: Level used to control association group 2 and 3
Level used to control association group 4 and 5.
Timer to switch OFF the Channel 1
paramInformation.description: Defines the time after which the Channel 1 is switched OFF

paramInformation.label: Timer to switch OFF the Channel 2
paramInformation.description: Defines the time after which the Channel 2 is switched OFF

paramInformation.label: Timer to switch ON the Channel 1
paramInformation.description: Defines the time after which the Channel 1 is switched ON

paramInformation.label: Timer to switch ON the Channel 2
paramInformation.description: Defines the time after which the Channel 2 is switched ON

paramInformation.label: Status after Multi-Channel Basic Set command
paramInformation.description: Defines how Basic Set commands controlling outputs

paramInformation.label: Outputs status upon receipt of a Basic Set command
paramInformation.description: Define which channels are controlled by Basic Set command

paramInformation.label: Start-up status
paramInformation.description: Defines the status of the device following a restart.

paramInformation.label: Configuration reset
paramInformation.description: Defines which parameters should be reset to default values

paramInformation.label: Type of external switch
paramInformation.description: Defines the type of external switch connected to the device
